argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_spsbc | |- ( A e. V -> ( A. x B = C -> [. A / x ]. B = C ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_sbceqg | |- ( A e. V -> ( [. A / x ]. B = C <-> [_ A / x ]_ B = [_ A / x ]_ C ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_sylibd | |- ( A e. V -> ( A. x B = C -> [_ A / x ]_ B = [_ A / x ]_ C ) ) |
\
 Formula-building implication rule for class substitution.  Closed form of ~ csbeq2i . ~ csbeq2gOLD is derived from the virtual deduction proof ~ csbeq2gVD .  (Contributed by Alan Sare, 10-Nov-2012.)  Obsolete version of ~ csbeq2 as of 11-Oct-2018.  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
